Bid To Win Approval Date to Empty
Bid To Win Approval to False
Bid To Win Approval to True

Blank Out Date Completed ITO OTR
Deal Desk Rating Equals Deal Desk
Set Big Deal Alert Sent field to True

Set Is Negotiating checkbox to true
Set multi tier flag as false

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Stage Change Date on change of opportunity stage.
fieldUpdates.name: Update Date On Stage Change Action

fieldUpdates.formula: If(AND(has_product_value_ge_og__c), If(primary_product_cm_ge_og__c!=0 && pipeline_amount_ge_og__c!=0, If(primary_product_cm_ge_og__c > 0 && pipeline_amount_ge_og__c > 0, (primary_product_cm_ge_og__c/pipeline_amount_ge_og__c), If(primary_product_cm_ge_og__c > 0 && pipeline_amount_ge_og__c < 0, (primary_product_cm_ge_og__c/pipeline_amount_ge_og__c) * -1, If(primary_product_cm_ge_og__c < 0 && pipeline_amount_ge_og__c > 0, (primary_product_cm_ge_og__c/pipeline_amount_ge_og__c), If(primary_product_cm_ge_og__c < 0 && pipeline_amount_ge_og__c < 0, (primary_product_cm_ge_og__c/pipeline_amount_ge_og__c) * -1, 0)))), 0),0)
fieldUpdates.name: Update_Opportunity_CM

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Opp Stage to Active - Commit.
fieldUpdates.name: Update Stage to Active - Commit
mark display ito otr to true
update email sent checkbox on opty

rules.fullName: Blank Out Date Completed ITO OTR

rules.formula: AND (NOT(ISPICKVAL( tier_3_ge_og__c , 'Flow & Process Technologies')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( F_AND_PT_Segment_GE_OG__c , '') ))

rules.description: If Forecast category changes and stagename not change then make forecast category Change = True
Rule to rollback the Closed Date to existing value if the EOD date is future date.
Estimate amount will be populated from opportunity amount if primaray product is added/deleted/modified.
rules.formula: IF( (ISCHANGED( pipeline_amount_ge_og__c) || ISCHANGED(OLICount_ge_og__c)) && OLICount_ge_og__c > 0, true, false)

rules.description: If Forecast Category is not Commit when new Opportunity is created, then make categoty as is.

rules.fullName: Populate Date completed for ITO OTR checklist
rules.formula: AND(( ITO_OTR_HANDOVER_CHECKLISTCOMPLETE_GE_OG__c = true ) , OR( ISCHANGED( ITO_OWNER_Ge_Og__c ), ISCHANGED( OTR_OWNER_EMAIL_Ge_Og__c ) , ISCHANGED( OTR_OWNER_SSO_GE_OG__c ) , ( (TEXT(PRIORVALUE(ITO_Supporting_Documents_Included_Ge_Og__c )) <> (TEXT(ITO_Supporting_Documents_Included_Ge_Og__c )))) ) )

rules.fullName: Record Type Name Update on opportunity
rules.description: Update Record Type Name in a custom field so that it can be tracked when the opportunity is closed and it's Record Type changes to O&G Closed.

rules.fullName: Set Is Negotiating checkbox to false
Set Is Negotiating checkbox to true

rules.description: Rule is intended to detect Digital Solutions - PII Pipeline Solutions opportunities which are Closed Won. Rule triggers an outbound message to a listner service to accomplish the automatic creation of a sales order in the ERP system (Oracle).

rules.fullName: Uncheck Multi tier flag for no Oppty products
Update Bid Sent Count on Oppty
Update Comm Ops Support to true for Deal desk
Update Convertibility to NULL when Tier 2 is OFS

rules.description: Date to be updated with Last stage change date

rules.fullName: Update Deal Desk Rating On Opportunity To Express
Update Deal Desk Rating On Opportunity To Undetermined
Update EOD Year %28Beyond Quarter%29 Convertible %28%24%29 to zero

rules.formula: AND(OR(IsPickVal(StageName,'Closed Won'), IsPickVal(StageName,'Closed Lost'), IsPickVal(StageName,'Cancelled')), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Grouped_Flow', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Hedge',RecordType.DeveloperName = 'OG') )
If(AND( RecordType.Name = $Label.O_G, ISPICKVAL( deal_path_ge_og__c ,'Express'), need_comm_ops_support_ge_og__c = True , ISBLANK(delivery_date_ge_og__c)),True,False)

rules.fullName: balnk out anti boycott request id
balnk out anti boycott request id when blank
blank out HRWF%23 and DSA WF %23
do not allow adding characters in antiboycottWF
notify OTR when opportunity is closed lost or cacelled
rules.formula: AND(OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Lost'),ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Cancelled')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL( tier_2_ge_og__c , ' Turbomachinery & Process Solutions')),NOT(otr_email_sent_for_closed_opty_ge_og__c),ITO_OTR_HANDOVER_CHECKLISTCOMPLETE_GE_OG__c)
